titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell, Receipt to Samuel Hinds
CWG13705

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 3

body.p:
No. 22.The State of Kentucky,
To -- Samuel Hinds Dr.

1862.
DOLLARS. CENTS.
Nov 17 To 1 Days Hawling 2 Horse Team 2 00
18 " 1 Days Hawling 2 Horse Team 2 00
Dec 4 " 1 Days Hawling 2 Horse Team 2 00
6 " 1 Days Hawling 4 Horse Team 3 200
9 00
Approved
By order of the Governor
Adjt Genl Ky Vols
For use of 2d & 3d Bat's 14th Ky Cav.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were a necessary for the public service.

Jones A Crawford
Lt & A. Q. M 2 & 3 Batt 14 Ky Cavly
Received at Frankfort on, the 20th.9th of MarchOct, 1863, of John W Finnell Adjutant General Quarter-master, Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Nine Dollars and -- Cents, in full of the above account.

11
No. 22.No. 29 Abstract B U Qr. 186.
Samuel Hinds
Dollars 9 -- /100
Paid Oct 9 1863
AC
Transportation
J 231
Pd by S G S Q M G
